snippet: On the first day of men's singles qualifying at the Australian Open, Denis Kudla prevailed and fellow Americans Michael Yani and Rajeev Ram fell.
abstract: On the first day of men's singles qualifying at the Australian Open, Denis Kudla prevailed and fellow Americans Michael Yani and Rajeev Ram fell.
lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia - Highlights and updates from the first day of men's singles qualifying at the 2012 Australian Open, an unseasonably brisk summer day in Melbourne.

headline.main: At Australian Open, a Busy Qualifying Day
